text: int main ( ) { int t , n , a [ 5050 ] , j , i , r , k , d , g ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < t ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; r = n ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n * ( n + 1 ) / 2 ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; g = n - 1 ; n = n + 1 ; d = i - n ; for ( j = i - n ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { if ( j == d ) { d = ( g * ( g - 1 ) / 2 ) - 1 ; g -- ; n -- ; } a [ j ] = a [ j ] + ( a [ j + n ] > a [ j + n - 1 ] ? a [ j + n ] : a [ j + n - 1 ] ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
